passives.name: Spellblade
passives.effects: After using an [[Champion ability|ability]], your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals {{as|75% '''base''' AD}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} on-hit and applies {{tip|on-hit}} effects to the target again after a {{fd|0.2}}-second delay ({{fd|1.5}} second cooldown, starts after using the empowered attack).
